pull_request.title: Perform monomorphization and constraint solving after type checking
pull_request.body:
This PR:
1. Make the `DeclId`s unique with a 1:1 ratio for data structure definition. This means that we can compare `DeclId`s directly, reduces the number of `DeclId`s that we produce, and reduces the number of times that we need to perform lookups in the `DeclEngine`
    a. Modify `PartialEqWithEngines` to no longer compare the `DeclId`s in the AST directly
    b. Remove the "parents" abstraction in the `DeclEngine`
2. Refactors monomorphization into a separate step following type checking
    a. This include trait constraint solving

Closes #3403 
Closes #1267
Closes #2636

Blocked by:
- #4082
- #4089
- #3762
- #4213

labels.description: Should be looked at before anything else

pull_request.title: Introduce explicit type check unification pass
pull_request.body:
## Description

This PR refactors code block and function unification into an explicit pass that we can run as a separate step from type checking.

The main idea is that we want to run monormophization after type checking, and unification needs to happen after monomorphization, so this is an incremental refactor as a first step to further move us in that direction in following PRs.

## Checklist

- [x] I have linked to any relevant issues.
- [x] I have commented my code, particularly in hard-to-understand areas.

- [x] I have requested a review from the relevant team or maintainers.
